law.catch_line: Amendments Adversely Affecting Rights Of Stockholder

text.section: alters or abolishes any preferential right of his stock having preferences;
creates, alters or abolishes any right in respect of redemption of his stock;
alters or abolishes any preemptive right in respect of his stock;
creates or alters (other than to abolish) any restriction on transfer applicable to his stock; or
excludes or limits his right as a stockholder to vote on a matter except as such right may be limited by voting rights given to new shares then being authorized of an existing or new class.
